task_summary: Perceive the pot and lid, grasp the lid by its top handle, and lift it vertically off the pot before retreating.

task_long_description.overview: The robot operates on a tabletop scene with a metal pot featuring a small top lid/knob. The arm must first localize the lid, approach from above with an open gripper, compute a top grasp, align precisely, make gentle contact, and close the gripper to secure the lid. After confirming a stable grasp, the robot lifts the lid vertically to clear the pot and retreats slightly to a safe pose. The sequence emphasizes reliable perception, vertical extraction to avoid collisions with the pot rim, and brief stabilization at the end.
preconditions: Pot with lid is on the table
stepwise_plan: Detect the lid on the pot
Move to a safe height above the lid
Open the gripper and compute a top grasp
Align with the grasp pose and descend until contact
Close the gripper and verify grasp stability
Lift the lid vertically and retreat slightly
success_criteria: Lid is securely held in the gripper
Lid is lifted clear of the pot rim
No collision with pot or environment
Arm retreats to a safe offset pose
failure_and_recovery: Misalignment/contact fail: re-approach and lower again
Unstable grasp: reopen, recompute grasp, and retry
Collision risk: abort lift and retreat
task_long_description.termination: End when lid is held above the pot and the arm has retreated to a safe pose.

frame_3.now_evidence: End-effector centered above the lid suggests alignment near contact.
frame_3.predicts_next: Vertical motion and grasp closing are likely to follow.

task_instruction: lift up a lid from the pot

node_specs.description: Detect the lid to obtain a valid target.
Move to a pregrasp pose above the lid.
Prepare the gripper for grasping the lid.
Compute a top grasp over the lid knob.
Align precisely with the grasp pose.
Descend gently until contact with the lid.
Verify that the grasp is stable.
Lift the lid vertically off the pot.
Back off to a safe pose.

failure_modes: Collision with pot rim during lift
recovery_strategy: Recompute grasp pose with new alignment
Open gripper and retry closing at the same pose
Abort lift, retreat, and reattempt from MoveAbove
assumptions: Frames show a pot with a small top lid/knob on a table with the robot approaching from the right.
No conflicting object labels are apparent; the instruction matches the visuals.

expected_success_criteria: Lid is grasped and lifted at least 0.1 m above the pot
No collisions or scraping the pot rim
